pull.title: drop my key from trusted-keys
pull.body:
As planned!

Also bump trusted-git-root to 88a7294356e75bbaa136c9427c64e239f7c6fd40, which is the last merge signed with this key.

events.body: The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers. ### Reviews See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process. | Type | Reviewers | | ---- | --------- | | ACK | [stickies-v](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/34517#pullrequestreview-3758487912), [achow101](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/34517#issuecomment-3855325211) | | Concept ACK | [luke-jr](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/34517#issuecomment-3854852005), [sedited](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/34517#issuecomment-3854922150), [darosior](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/34517#pullrequestreview-3758331415) | If your review is incorrectly listed, please copy-paste <!--meta-tag:bot-skip--> into the comment that the bot should ignore.

Concept ACK.

Sorry to see you go. Thanks for your maintenance work until now, and I appreciate you promptly dropping your commit access once it was no longer in use.

ACK f2b8acc0edb6f1acf58cd3d7423d6ad60e8d90c8

I verified that the correct key `6B002C6EA3F91B1B0DF0C9BC8F617F1200A6D25C` is removed, and that `88a7294356e75bbaa136c9427c64e239f7c6fd40` is the last merge commit signed by this key, making it the suitable new `trusted-git-root` (as it appears since #27058 we're not using `allow-revsig-commits` anymore, I'm not intimately familiar with this process).

I'm grateful for the excellent work you've done since becoming a maintainer ~3.5years ago, thank you glozow.

ACK f2b8acc0edb6f1acf58cd3d7423d6ad60e8d90c8

Thank you for all the work you've done as a maintainer, sad to see you go.
